entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
